malambae newil pranandu rohala giwisumakin thorawa rajayata pawaraganime siduwimata adalawa saukhya amathya rajitha senarathnata erehiwa ada paswaruwe rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya allas ho dushana wimarshana komisama wetha paminillak idiripath kala.me athara, malambae newil pranandu rohale paripalana katayuthu me wana wita rajayata pawaragena aththe abhimathaya palakerena lipiyakin pamanak bawa saukhya amathyanshaye lekam janaka sugathadasa madhya niwedanayak nikuth karamin pawasanawa.rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya pasugiyada pawathi prawruththi sakachchawakadi pawasuye malambae newil pranandu rohala rajayata pawaraganime kisidu giwisumak me wana wita athsan kara nomathi bawath agosthu palamuwanida athsan kerune abhimathaya palakirime lipiyak pamanak wana bawayi.saukhya amathyanshaye lekamwaraya nikuth kala madhya niwedanaya magin penwa di aththe agosthu masa 01 wanida malambae newil pranandu rohale paripalana katayuthu rajayata pawaraganna ladde abhimathaya palakirime lipiyak magin bawayi.emenma nithipathi departhamenthuwa wisin widhimath karunu athulath giwisumak me wana wita sakaskaramin sitina athara eeta adala nithyanukula liyakiyawili sakaskirimen anathuruwa adala parshawayan giwisumata athsan karana bawa niwedanaye wadiduratath sadahan.me athara ada paswaruwe sayitam wirodhi sisujana wyaparaya sanwidhanaya kala sisujana samuluwa nugegoda aananda samarakon elimahan ranga pitayedi pawathwuna.
